messages.content: Hi there! How can I help you?

Aniline has a solubility of 8.7 g/100g in water at room temperature. It is slightly soluble in water, but solubility increases with temperature. Higher temperatures and the presence of an alkali metal hydroxide can also increase solubility.
What are 5 main aspects of anti-sense oligonucleotides?

The five main aspects of anti-sense oligonucleotides are: (1) Suppression of gene expression by binding to mRNA, (2) Targeting of specific mRNAs, (3) Increased stability of mRNAs, (4) Inhibition of protein translation, and (5) Regulation of gene splicing.
